[[American Dad!]] is an American adult animated sitcom created by Mike Barker,
Matt Weitzman, and Seth MacFarlane for the Fox Broadcasting Company. Set in
the fictional town of Langley Falls, Virginia, the series centers on the
eccentric Smith family and their three housemates. The Smith family consists
of title character Stan, Francine, Hayley, and Steve, and their three
housemates are Roger, an alien whom Stan has rescued from government capture
and harbors in the family's attic; Jeff Fischer, Hayley's boyfriend and
eventual husband; and Klaus, the family's pet who is really an East German man
trapped in a fish's body.

Since its debut on February 6, 2005, American Dad! has broadcast 152 episodes.
The series been renewed through season 10 on Fox, which is set to premiere on
September 29, 2013. After the tenth season, the series
will move to TBS, where it will begin season 11 in 2014.
